jobs: FixViolationToPassBlocks: Fix writeTests.md directive 6 violations in clients-list-page.spec.ts — replace count()/textContent() calls inside .toPass() blocks with atomic Playwright assertions in CLP-FLT-06 (line 498), CLP-FLT-09 (line 548), and CLP-TBL-08 (line 712)

FixViolationWeakFilterTests: Fix writeTests.md directive 8 violations in clients-list-page.spec.ts — CLP-SRCH-03, CLP-SRCH-04, CLP-FLT-04, CLP-FLT-06 have assertions that only check rowCount >= 0 instead of verifying actual filter results
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fixes
FixViolation: Fix SidebarNavigation component description in docs/tests.md line 85 — update from 'Clients, Deals, Tasks' to include all six nav links: Clients, Contacts, Deals, Tasks, Team, Settings
